00021 #include "rtest/RT_Check.h"
00022 #include "rtest/RT_Cmd.h"
00023 #include "rtest/RT_Main.h"
00024 #include "rtest/RT_Test.h"
00025 #include "util/Fs.h"
00026 #include "util/Util.h"

00034 using namespace std;

00036 //Array containing the names example CHP files
00037 const char *chpFiles[] = {
00038   "NA06985_GW6_C", "NA06993_GW6_C", "NA07000_GW6_C", 
00039   "NA07019_GW6_C", "NA07029_GW6_C", "NA07056_GW6_C", 
00040   "NA07345_GW6_C", "NA10830_GW6_C", "NA10831_GW6_C", 
00041   "NA10839_GW6_C", "NA10855_GW6_C", "NA10857_GW6_C", 
00042   "NA10860_GW6_C", "NA10863_GW6_C", "NA11881_GW6_C", 
00043   "NA11882_GW6_C", "NA11993_GW6_C", "NA12003_GW6_C", 
00044   "NA12004_GW6_C",
00045   NULL
00046 };

00048 //Function Forward Declaration
00049 RT_Test* defineDoChpFiles();
00050 RT_Test* defineDoChpFilesDefault();

00052 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 //Main Function
00054 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00055 {
00056 
00057   ///Create Output Directories
00058   if ( !Fs::dirExists("test-generated") ) {
00059     Fs::mkdir("test-generated", false);
00060   }
00061 
00062   //Create new instance or RT_Main that will contain our suite of tests
00063   RT_Main* rMain = new RT_Main("apt-rt-canary");
00064 
00065   //Store names of tests for Help Message
00066   //Store it in our RT_Main Instance
00067   std::vector<std::string> testNameList;
00068   testNameList.push_back("doChpFiles");
00069   testNameList.push_back("doChpFilesDefault");
00070   rMain->setTestNameList(testNameList);
00071 
00072   ///Set Variables for this test environment
00073   rMain->setVar("sdktop", "../..");
00074   rMain->setVar("chpfilessuffix", ".canary-v1.cnvchp"); 
00075   rMain->setVar("gold_lib_genomewidesnp6", "${gold_dir}/lib/GenomeWideSNP_6");
00076   rMain->setVar("gold_canary_genomewidesnp6", "${gold_dir}/canary/GenomeWideSNP_6");
00077   rMain->setVar("gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6}/${testname}");
00078 
00079   //If no Arguments are Given
00080   ///They want us to run all default tests
00081   if(argc == 1)
00082     {
00083       cout<<"Running All Default Regression Tests"<<endl;
00084       rMain->addTest(defineDoChpFiles());
00085       rMain->addTest(defineDoChpFilesDefault());
00086     }
00087   //Parse the argv and run specified tests/options
00088   else
00089     {
00090       rMain->parseArgv(argc, argv);
00091 
00092       cout<<"Running Built-In Regression Tests"<<endl;
00093      
00094       if(rMain->getVarVal("doChpFiles") != "")
00095         {
00096           rMain->addTest(defineDoChpFiles());
00097         }
00098       if(rMain->getVarVal("doChpFilesDefault") != "")
00099         {
00100           rMain->addTest(defineDoChpFilesDefault());
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104   //Run All tests that have been built up into the framework
00105   rMain->runTests();
00106 }
00107 
00108 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00109 //Creates new test called doChpFiles
00110 RT_Test* defineDoChpFiles()
00111 {
00112   //Create new RT_Test instance
00113   RT_Test* rt =  new RT_Test("doChpFiles");
00114 
00115   //Create new command that will be stored in our Test
00116   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00117   //Set the Executable
00118   cmd->setExe("${apt_canary}");
00119   //Add command line arguments for this command
00120   cmd->addArg("--apt-summarize-analysis", "quant-norm.target=1000,pm-only,plier.optmethod=1,expr.genotype=true");
00121   cmd->addArg("--apt-canary-analysis", "af-weight=1.0,TOL=1e-3,hwe_tol=1e-4,hwe_tol2=1e-11,fraction-giveaway-0=0.20,fraction-giveaway-1=0.10,fraction-giveaway-2=0.15,fraction-giveaway-3=0.20,fraction-giveaway-4=0.30,min-fill-prop=0.10,conf-interval-half-width=1.959963984540054,inflation=1.3,min-cluster-variance=0.0001,pseudopoint-factor=100");
00122   cmd->addArg("--out-dir", "${out_testname}");
00123   cmd->addArg("--cdf-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf");
00124   cmd->addArg("--cnv-region-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.canary-v1.region");
00125   cmd->addArg("--cnv-normalization-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.canary-v1.normalization");
00126   cmd->addArg("--cnv-prior-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.canary-v1.prior");
00127   cmd->addArg("--cnv-map-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.canary-v1.bed");
00128   cmd->addArg("--analysis-name", "canary-v1");
00129   cmd->addArg("--cel-files", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6}/fas_cel_files.txt");
00130   cmd->addArg("--cc-chp-output", "true");
00131   cmd->addArg("--table-output", "true");
00132   
00133   //Produce a vector of generated and gold files by combining our array of files with a given prefix and suffix
00134   vector<string> gold,gen;
00135   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(chpFiles, "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/", "${chpfilessuffix}");
00136   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(chpFiles, "${out_testname}/", "${chpfilessuffix}");
00137 
00138   //Create new Calvin Chp Checks
00139   //Creates multiple checks from the given gen and gold vectors
00140   //Breaks them down into individual pairs of files
00141   //length of gen must equal length of gold
00142   RT_Check* check = rt->newCheck();
00143   check->setExe("${apt_check_calvinchp}");
00144   check->setGenFiles(gen);
00145   check->setGoldFiles(gold);
00146   //rt->addCheckMult("${apt_check_calvinchp}", gen, gold);
00147 
00148   //Create new Matrix Check
00149   RT_Check* check1 = rt->newCheck();
00150   //Set the exe
00151   check1->setExe("${apt_check_matrix}");
00152   //Add command line Arguments
00153   check1->addArg("--gen", "${out_testname}/canary-v1.allele_average_summary.txt");
00154   check1->addArg("--gold", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/canary-v1.allele_average_summary.txt"); 
00155   check1->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00156   check1->addArg("--rowSkip", "1"); 
00157   check1->addArg("--columnSkip", "1");
00158   check1->addArg("--matchNames", "false");
00159   check1->addArg("--allowedMismatch", "0");
00160 
00161   //Create new Matrix Check
00162   RT_Check* check2 = rt->newCheck();
00163   check2->setExe("${apt_check_matrix}");
00164   check2->addArg("--gen", "${out_testname}/canary-v1.calls.txt");
00165   check2->addArg("--gold", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/canary-v1.calls.txt"); 
00166   check2->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00167   check2->addArg("--rowSkip", "1"); 
00168   check2->addArg("--columnSkip", "1");
00169   check2->addArg("--matchNames", "false");
00170   check2->addArg("--allowedMismatch", "0");
00171 
00172   //Create new Matrix Check
00173   RT_Check* check3 = rt->newCheck();
00174   check3->setExe("${apt_check_matrix}");
00175   check3->addArg("--gen", "${out_testname}/canary-v1.cnv_region_summary.txt");
00176   check3->addArg("--gold", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/canary-v1.cnv_region_summary.txt"); 
00177   check3->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00178   check3->addArg("--rowSkip", "1"); 
00179   check3->addArg("--columnSkip", "1");
00180   check3->addArg("--matchNames", "false");
00181   check3->addArg("--allowedMismatch", "0");
00182 
00183   //Create new Matrix Check
00184   RT_Check* check4 = rt->newCheck();
00185   check4->setExe("${apt_check_matrix}");
00186   check4->addArg("--gen", "${out_testname}/canary-v1.confidences.txt");
00187   check4->addArg("--gold", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/canary-v1.confidences.txt"); 
00188   check4->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00189   check4->addArg("--rowSkip", "1"); 
00190   check4->addArg("--columnSkip", "1");
00191   check4->addArg("--matchNames", "false");
00192   check4->addArg("--allowedMismatch", "0");
00193 
00194   //Create new Matrix Check
00195   RT_Check* check5 = rt->newCheck();
00196   check5->setExe("${apt_check_matrix}");
00197   check5->addArg("--gen", "${out_testname}/canary-v1.summary.txt");
00198   check5->addArg("--gold", "${gold_canary_genomewidesnp6_testname}/canary-v1.summary.txt"); 
00199   check5->addArg("--epsilon", "0.0001");
00200   check5->addArg("--rowSkip", "1"); 
00201   check5->addArg("--columnSkip", "1");
00202   check5->addArg("--matchNames", "false");
00203   check5->addArg("--allowedMismatch", "0");
00204 
00205   //Return a pointer to the test just created
00206   return rt;
00207 }

00210 RT_Test* defineDoChpFilesDefault()
00211 {
00212   //Create new RT_Test instance
00213   RT_Test* rt= new RT_Test("doChpFilesDefault");
00214 
00215   //Create new command that will be stored in our Test
00216   RT_Cmd* cmd = rt->newCmd();
00217   cmd->setExe("${apt_canary}");
00218   cmd->addArg("--out-dir", "${out_testname}");
00219   cmd->addArg("--cdf-file", "${gold_lib_genomewidesnp6}/GenomeWideSNP_6.cdf");

00230   vector<string> gold,gen;
